Articles.Content:
How this works: Post the craziest crafts you have for 0.90 and they will forever be remembered here!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-27T17:13:05Z" title="04/27/2015 05:13  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 27, 2015</time> by Kozak**
WHat are you doing?????? JOIN THE TRAIN!!!!!!

this is no hype train... it can go to orbit with small payload of 2-3 ton.

![aY47LLe.png](http://i.imgur.com/aY47LLe.png)

> 
> WHat are you doing?????? JOIN THE TRAIN!!!!!!

Yea, join the hype train!
![GR6I4xL.png](http://i.imgur.com/GR6I4xL.png) I'll just leave this here guys. see ya on ksptv o/

> 
> [http://i.imgur.com/GR6I4xL.png](http://i.imgur.com/GR6I4xL.png) I'll just leave this here guys. see ya on ksptv o/

+rep o.o

Goodbye old save I had for 5 KSP versions ;(

But his video I made is epic as a conclusion to it!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/8rrAT1XIVKM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Kron 3. The largest monster I've ever assembled.

![Kron3_LW.png](http://s14.postimg.org/cguvg1htd/Kron3_LW.png)

I am sorry I missed the release. I couldn't have helped it. I'm just so glad someone pulled the brake lever. You should get a Hype Medal!

I can't play it yet, but it will be the first thing I do when i get home!
